title: What is the Monte-Carlo Masters schedule?
description: Quarter-final spots are up for grabs Thursday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where second seed Carlos Alcaraz headlines play on Court Rainier III. Indian Wells champion Jack Draper and three-time Monte-Carlo titlist Stefanos Tsitsipas will also be in action. On Court Des Princes, Daniil Medvedev, Casper Ruud, 2023 champion Andrey Rublev and Grigor Dimitrov are among the stars competing. Alejandro Tabilo looks to build upon his upset over 99-time tour-level titlist Novak Djokovic. View the full schedule for Thursday's play below. ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 10 APRIL 2025 Court Rainier III - start 11:00 AM [5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) [Q] Daniel Altmaier (GER) vs [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) Matteo Berrettini (ITA) vs [13] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) Nuno Borges (POR) vs [6] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) Court Des Princes - start 11:00 AM [7] Andrey Rublev vs [12] Arthur Fils (FRA) Not Before 1:00 PM Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs [4] Casper Ruud (NOR) Not Before 2:30 PM [9] Daniil Medvedev vs [8] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Alejandro Tabilo (CHI) vs [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) Court EA de Massy - start 11:00 AM Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) [4] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs Hugo Nys (MON) / Edouard Roger-Vasselin (FRA) Followed By After Suitable Rest - [WC] Romain Arneodo (MON) / Manuel Guinard (FRA) vs Jack Draper (GBR) / Tomas Machac (CZE) Click Here to read: Three surprising facts about Djokovic's defeat in Monte-Carlo [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: The first clay-court ATP Masters 1000 event of the season continues on Thursday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where Carlos Alcaraz and Stefanos Tsitsipas are in action.

Monte-Carlo

Alcaraz continues second Monte-Carlo outing, three-time champ Tsitsipas in action

April 09, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The 2025 Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters will be played from 6-13 April. By ATP Staff

Quarter-final spots are up for grabs Thursday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where second seed Carlos Alcaraz headlines play on Court Rainier III. Indian Wells champion Jack Draper and three-time Monte-Carlo titlist Stefanos Tsitsipas will also be in action.

On Court Des Princes, Daniil Medvedev, Casper Ruud, 2023 champion Andrey Rublev and Grigor Dimitrov are among the stars competing. Alejandro Tabilo looks to build upon his upset over 99-time tour-level titlist Novak Djokovic. View the full schedule for Thursday's play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 10 APRIL 2025
Court Rainier III - start 11:00 AM
[5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP)
[Q] Daniel Altmaier (GER) vs [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP)
Matteo Berrettini (ITA) vs [13] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)
Nuno Borges (POR) vs [6] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE)

Court Des Princes - start 11:00 AM
[7] Andrey Rublev vs [12] Arthur Fils (FRA)

Not Before 1:00 PM
Alexei Popyrin (AUS) vs [4] Casper Ruud (NOR)

Not Before 2:30 PM
[9] Daniil Medvedev vs [8] Alex de Minaur (AUS)
Alejandro Tabilo (CHI) vs [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL)

Court EA de Massy - start 11:00 AM
Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR)
[4] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) vs Hugo Nys (MON) / Edouard Roger-Vasselin (FRA)

Followed By
After Suitable Rest - [WC] Romain Arneodo (MON) / Manuel Guinard (FRA) vs Jack Draper (GBR) / Tomas Machac (CZE)

Click Here to read: Three surprising facts about Djokovic's defeat in Monte-Carlo
